lines.text: I'd like to call everyone together, if I could, first. Let's take a moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just looking. I take another potion, because I have one more. And I'm going to look down the hall.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Wait, friend. I give him a potion of superior healing.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You know I'm a healer, right? You can save your potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Save it. What's that? Superior is a 4d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Superior's another 4d4, yeah. You guys can take a short rest, if you wish to, and also use your hit dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get some healing? Will you use some of that positive energy on me?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Of course I will.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I will go no further until I take a proper rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to look down that hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something has seeped through from some unseen source, and has slowly, over time, dissolved a large pit into the center of this hallway. This dull yellowish-green liquid now fills the entirety of the center portion of this hallway for a good, let's say, about that distance, there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I put my hand on Thorbir's hand and guide him back out and shut the door and say, it's fucking acid in that room. I just sit on the ground.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Of course it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm back in the hall with you. Acid-filled room. I'm going to rest. Let's all just take a breather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we make camp? I'm hurting really bad.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's take a moment here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I agree. We've been hit pretty hard, pretty quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to camp, or do you want to take a breather?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just take a rest. Actually, I have something that I think will make us all feel better. And I prepare a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You have those?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll tell you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are there bananas?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 20-foot-long hoagie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it's the 20-foot-long Subway dealio.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, not Subway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha. Just a heads-up. One of the material components is a gem-encrusted bowl that costs 1000 gold pieces that is consumed by it. You can totally cast this, but you'll have to deduct a thousand gold off your personal gold supply.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How much money have you got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like 3k, I think.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You have 3k? You said you were single?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, fine. I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, I've just had a near-death experience. I've been craving some lasagna. Okay? So I'm going to make some of the best goddamn lasagna we've ever had in our life. I'm going to spend a thousand dollars and make some amazing fucking lasagna.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What are dollars?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A thousand gold.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: What's lasagna?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a tribal food that her people eat. It's vegetarian.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If she's spending the money, I'll eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fruits and breads and meats all just strewn about this table in the center of this prison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, everybody. Close your eyes. Okay? Tiberius, will you make the little forks dance for me with Mage Hand?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Are you guys ready? (singing) Be our guest, be our guest, put our service to the test!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is this a thing? Is this happening right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I'm making a musical out of our food. People pay a lot of money for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She set it out. Have a seat. Eat the food.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought that was funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just start eating. I'm wiped out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys can use as many hit dice as you want to heal yourself. If you check on your sheet, it has a hit dice number. Use those to heal yourself naturally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So after we eat all of this food, we are cured of all diseases and poisons. We become immune to poison and being frightened, and all of our wisdom saving throws have advantage. Also, our maximum hit points increase by 2d10.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: For how long?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to eat our way to health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning, you gain 2d10 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it gains the same number of hit points. Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you increase the maximum and you heal up what you gained.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I see what it means.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So how do you heal yourself, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where it says hit dice, on your page? It should be toward the middle, right above your attacks.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can spend up to your top level and you roll a dice with the number you have for your hit dice, and you heal that much. So what's the number that you have there?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Total is 11. 1d8 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can spend up to 11 if you want to, and heal up that much naturally.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But I wasn't taking any damage. That's the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you burn all of your sorcerer points? We told you not to burn all of your sorcerer points. We don't have time to sit here and take a full rest.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can still cure everybody, you know. I can heal everybody. The wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Use your hit dice to heal yourself. You commence on the meal, and it is a very delightful meal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can ask the group, but I have a feeling that Vax and Thorbir aren't going to want to take a full rest down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to get gone. That guy or that gal.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Both of them.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: It's a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to go on a date with it. I want to kill it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So while we're sitting here, can I cast Locate Creature? Oh, wait. Here's a question that I have. How much time has passed since the last time I cast it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, with shopping time, it's probably been about six hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're on the clock, here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're still on day one.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It lasts for up to an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you'd have to re-cast it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. But that's my question. My level-4 spells, I cast three of them last game, so do I get those back for this one? They're gone, right? I can't cast. So that's what I thought. I can't cast Locate Creature. I wish I could help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Locate Creature currently cannot be cast. You spent all your 4th level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long does everything last from that feast, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 hours. So we can still take a long rest and still have benefits from the feast. It lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: If we wait, it escapes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He's a day longer away, and we only have three days to do this.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: How will we explain ourselves to them? And what if those things come back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have no melee offenses towards this creature, whatsoever, so that's going to be up to you with magical weapons and whatnot, I'm assuming. I'm virtually tapped out of all my spells. So is the cleric, as well. So if we move forward, that's fine. We're only six hours in on the first day of this contract.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the cleric is burned out of 4th-level spells. Cleric is good.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's time or it's strength. That's what we're talking about. We wait and we go in, fully charged. Or we go now and we have a much better chance of catching up to it, but weakened.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I will follow the group.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're in charge. What do you say?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Oh, now I'm in charge?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You've always been in charge. Because you chose not to lead was your own fault.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: We go.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get another healing spell, then, Cashew?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Why don't I do Mass Cure Wounds on everybody?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that would be great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm already good.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I flip my last potion to Keyleth. It's a superior.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what are those? 2d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 8d4 plus eight. Did you use your hit dice to heal yourself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did. 8d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight. Big heal.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's see if you're even going to need me to mass cure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) Let me get more d4s out. I'll do this twice. That will be enough. Four, five, six, seven, eight, nine. Oh, that's good. Eight, so that's 15, 19, 22, plus another eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus another eight, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 30. Cool. Awesome.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So is everybody good? Anybody need healing?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you knew we were on a time crunch, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have days left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were chasing him down a hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hang out with Johnny Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) I like Johnny Kraghammer.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Johnny Kraghammer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Long story, Kash. Let's go. I'm going to slowly push that door open and try to use perception in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. If that crud is moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Were you about to do something, Keyleth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And try to see a door on the far end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, you know what? Here's what I'm going to do instead. Let me double-check and make sure I can do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look inside, you walk up to the liquid. It looks like there is a very slow flow to it, coming at an angle. It's very thick and looks like it's melted through the basis of the floor and almost like it would continue under, around, and out of this room into whatever is beyond. You get a feeling there is something to why this part of the prison was probably abandoned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That other one, yeah. Perception check there, as well. That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The door is not currently locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and does that count for the traps, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not trapped, either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to open it an inch and see what I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look inside. There is a large collapsed pile of rubble. Whatever this room once was has entirely collapsed on itself. You can see, it's pushed up against the door. Something made this room inert, and it's not currently functional.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Acid, it is.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Acid alley is the only way to go.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Wait, there's a door at the end of this hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I just looked in.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: A third door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, a third door. I thought there was two.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: There's a third door. I once knew someone who met a bad fate in acid. I would prefer to not encounter it myself.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I agree.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: He was a good man.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I heard he was brave. Very brave.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I never heard about this. How did you hear about this?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: He was a good man who was murdered by the gods.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It is legend.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The acid guy is legend? All right.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I go walking down the hallway, this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, what are you doing? You're meditating?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me wait until he opens this door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'll make a perception check at that door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The door does not appear to be trapped. You don't know if it's locked yet. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just, allow me. You're strong.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's what they say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is also, from your perspective, not locked or trapped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, now I'm going to drop to my knees and cast Locate Creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're finishing your small ritual for Locate Creature, you open up the door, and it is a spiral staircase that leads upward. You get the sensation this is where those earlier Bastions were coming from.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No acid in this room, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a staircase up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finish Locate Creature, and you sit there, and you can sense, grasping on that one encounter you had with the rakshasa, though it was still disguised as a dwarf, and the descriptor you have. And you recognize this immediately. This is the same type of ritual that you did earlier, and so there's now this weird, synchronous moment that you share magical knowledge.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And she has money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she has money. Though a thousand less, now. You finish your concentration for a second, and the divine energy pulls you in a direction, and it pulls you in the direction of this way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I think we're going to need to go through the acid.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My armor is resistant to acid. Let me lead the way. Is there any shit sitting around? Any rubbish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are clumps of what looks like a destroyed crate, pieces of stone that have fallen from the partially collapsed walls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull up a plank of that crate.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's doing this, I cast Fly on Thorbir, Keyleth, the cleric, and Vax. And myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only cast it on three people.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can cast it at 6th level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 6th level. It's one additional person per spell level.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm terrible at math. Not Vax.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: With your math and my rolling, we are a formidable team.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Us four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's a 3rd-level spell, so you can do four. Okay. So against who?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone but me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone but you. Okay. So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait. We brought the flying carpet with us. It's in your Bag of Holding.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You have a flying carpet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there's that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Like pools of acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we pull that out?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. That's a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're pulling out the flying carpet, we're going to go ahead and take a break. Quick restroom break for about five minutes or so, and we'll come right back to continue as they enter the room with a rather large pit of acid. We'll be back in five minutes, guys. See you in a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Acid pit! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, guys! Before we get back to the game, Orion, you want to talk about that video?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. That Disney princess shit you saw was Lewberger, and they're playing tomorrow at Gather Your Party on this channel, and I will be performing songs with Alex Lewis, who's half of Lewberger, and I get to call Zac a dumdum for once. Zac the dumdum played the one video that I'm not in.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Technically, the video I was sent ten minutes before show started.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry about that, for the confusion. That's what's going on. You'll see me dance like a monkey tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's okay. It was a hell of a way to break the tension, so it worked out well. All right, so as the rest of you have found your way into this long, partially eroded hallway containing this thick green viscous liquid, you have pulled out the flying carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. We all fit on it, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yeah, we can all get on this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you maybe want to sparrow across, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! We took a short rest. I could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I get to come.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: We have flying carpets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Built by some of our amazing Critters. I'm going to go ahead and go with the crocheted one tonight.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Crocheting is fantastic, and a wonderful way to spend your time.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: You guys have the best fans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We really do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys are pretty great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we all fit! We're good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, we all fit on it? Oh, look at that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Onward!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drift down the hallway on the flying carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Staring at the slime on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air itself, like I said, it hurts. You have to continuously rub your eyes and keep them shut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I make a nice little wind zephyr to give us a little airflow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you move partway through this section, everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's helming the magic carpet, by the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like Kash is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am helming the damn magic carpet, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you're helming the magic carpet.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I rolled a six plus a 12 total, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you rolled a total of what?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So pulling forward, as you come around through the sections of the wall that are collapsed in rubble, you notice that there are some sigils in the wall. Two-foot-high carved-stone sigils about five feet ahead of you guys. There's one on each side.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are they infernal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not infernal. They are arcane in nature, though. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes I really hate this old-world shit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I do a religion check on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I got ten, so I figured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There doesn't appear to be much religious connotation to these symbols, but they're old, and it looks like they were placed there for a specific reason. That's as much as you can get from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I make out any traps or anything in the ceilings or the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check. Tiberius points it out to the rest of you guys, and you can see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But nothing in addition to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Especially for you, your experience doesn't fall too much in the realm of the arcane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I do a history check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about handle animals, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Try every skill. Just go through the whole list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's nothing really historic about this, other than the fact that you're in the historic Amaranthine Oubliette prison here.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Did anyone make an arcana check? And we didn't find anything out? Is this something that my stonecunning skills would be relevant to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not structural. In looking at it, it looks like these were added to it once it was built, although it is a storage room, so it's strange that these would be placed in the center of the room.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Would I make an insight check, perhaps? No, that doesn't apply.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight's more for individuals and motives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wisdom saving throws. Continue.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I just don't want to be over this acid anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you push forward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be all right.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's what my friend thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push forward. You get about here as you're passing through the two sigils, and there's a flash from the sigils. They glow bright, and it's almost like two flashbulbs go off from side to side. You stop. The carpet dips. As in, the carpet goes limp.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the carpet goes limp, you all begin to plummet forward. You need to go ahead and make a concentration check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's with your constitution modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is something about these sigils that is cancelling magic. However, the carpet is now going limp and all of you are now plummeting down towards the acidic surface below. Your action was casting Fly. There is one piece of open ground here that can fit maybe two people.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Thorbir dives for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I cast Wall of Stone and make a big stone underneath of us to support the carpet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a concentration check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's use this one. Add my what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw, essentially, is what it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution saving throw? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is to maintain your concentration as you're falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thorbir. Who else is jumping for the platform?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius is falling. I want you guys-- Tiberius, Thorbir, Vax, and Kash-- to all make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me how I would go about doing this. As I fall with the carpet, I want to try to pull up on the carpet and land in the shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. All right. What was your dex?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Seven? (laughs) Fail.

lines.text: You're thinking, oh, clearly I haven't touched my die because the last time I rolled my die, it had a one on it. But in fact, I did roll another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like we're this close to starting the apocalypse. With each one that you roll--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: One small black hole is getting a little bit bigger in the universe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Somewhere deep beneath the Vatican, there's some monk who's running around screaming as their artifacts are cracking in half. That's amazing. All right. Well, that is 33 points of damage to Thorbir and to Brother Kash. Half of that to both of you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much was the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was 33. So half of that would put you at 16.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what did we have to hit? I rolled a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 16? It would be a 16.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I made it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you made it. You take no damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing. I hit the ground and roll. Stop, drop, and roll, people! Stop, drop, and roll.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Little busy right now, on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kash, what are you doing?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I've got to heal myself, unfortunately, because I'm getting down there. So I'm going to Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At what level? You can cast it at a higher level.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I know. I'm not sure I want to, yet. You know what? I am. I'm going to Mass Cure Wounds right now, just because I'm so low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So it's level 5.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Did you do this to them? Did you come to watch them die when they were playing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is 3d8 plus five.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 3d8 plus five. Where are the d8s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look under your special abilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you get plus two to all your healing spells.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So 3d8.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nice, okay. That's good. So 17 plus five, you said? So that's 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus two.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's plus seven on top of that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Now there's all these numbers. 17 plus two, so that's 19. Plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. So it's 24. Okay. So everybody gets 24, is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back up to full. And remember, you get plus 2d12 to your max hit points because we ate good food. Nothing beats a home-cooked meal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. You're done. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Faerie Fire, right on the rakshasa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Rakshasa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Faerie Fire, and you can see the energy coalesce and dissipate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rakshasa: unaffected entirely by the spell.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at him, and I go, um? And now I'm going Minxie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going Minxie!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiger on tiger?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiger on tiger!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There's a website for that.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I saw the show at the Bellagio. It's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as Keyleth now angrily morphs into this large, white saber-toothed tiger that roars on the ground where she once was. You can move, still, if you wish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going for rakshasa, so I'm going to head this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a speed of 40, I think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speed is 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can get right up next to it. Yep. So you run around the side of the giant statue and right up in the face of Hotis, personally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine. Bring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thorbir, you're on deck.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Fine. I'm going to attempt to cast Slow on both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On both of them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, I think I can pick who I affect. And that's what I do. Slow down. I think that will affect the rakshasa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. The golem-like creature-- which, if you want to make an arcana check right now, see if you can ID it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You haven't seen one of these before, but you've heard about it in passing, and you feel like there was a story once about it. It's referred to as a shield guardian. It is linked to whoever wears the amulet and manages to share damage, should the wearer take damage.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, that's interesting to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It also slowly repairs itself over time. So yes. You cast Slow. The rakshasa appears unaffected. However, the guardian's movements do seem to shimmer and shake as it's forcing its way through the arcane net you've now cast around it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool. So now it takes a negative two penalty to its AC and its dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet. And I move as far away from everything as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So where are you going? Over here? That's about as far as you can get away from everything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That brings us to Thorbir.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Am I close enough to charge up and hit that guardian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. You could probably leap over these. You could do that.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I would like to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You leap across, grin and bear it as you dodge over the bits of acid, cringing.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm accustomed to failure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you rush up to the side with your axe and?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Does that mean I get to do six attacks?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's going to be six points! Go for it.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I know, right? Okay. If I'm going to use a maneuver, do I have to declare it ahead of time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say yes.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: This is a commander's strike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go. This is science.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah!

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: "That creature can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, adding the superiority die "to the attack's damage roll." So I would like to direct the tiger thing to attack the tiger thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm there.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So that's with my first attack situation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first, roll your damage from the strike.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Six plus six slashing damage. 12 slash.

lines.text: 12 slashing. Nice.

lines.text: Do I roll the superiority die for her, or does she roll it?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: You don't want to touch this, so just roll a d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (roars) So I'm going to do my bite attack. And I get to add this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To your damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To damage? Okay, so that's 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.text: That's all right. Second attack.

lines.text: Do I get to keep this, or was that the only time?

lines.text: That's the only time.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Ha! That's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You hit the side of its armor and deflects off the side with a loud ringing sound.

lines.name: WIL

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Okay, attack number four is a 27!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits!

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: How about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll some damage on that one.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: This is going to be-- shoot, sorry. My thing got moved around. Apologies. Sorry! This is ruining the dramatic tension. This is a precision attack, so I use a superiority die and I add it to my damage roll, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's added to your attack.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Son of a bitch! All right. Never mind, then I'm just going to roll regular damage. That's one plus six is seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Fifth attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two more.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your last one.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: All right, here's my last attack. Oh, it's an 18! I crit on an 18!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You crit on an 18?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I crit on an 18. Son of a bitch! No, I don't! Fuck me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even your memory betrays you, Wheaton.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I know. It does. 28?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 I think will hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Great. Oh, and let me look at these things and see if any of this useless stuff is going to do any good for me at all. Oh, you know what? I'm going to use this as a maneuvering attack. I can expend a superiority die to maneuver one of my comrades into a more advantageous position. One of my comrades can move-- there's no point in doing that. I thought I could move the bad guy, which is what I could do if I had a pushing attack. All right, so. Can I use my riposte? When a creature misses you with a melee attack, use your reaction and expend a die to make a melee attack against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd do that if it attacks you.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Great. Okay, so I'm just going to remember that I have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just do your damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So out of the six strikes, three make contact. You're starting to carve sections into the leathery connecting areas of the shield guardian. You're doing damage, but it's still pretty hardy and holding itself up. That ends your turn, Thorbir? Up at the top. Hotis, who is unhappy and next to you, is going to disengage here.

lines.text: Do I get a free attack?

lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growls) Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: yeah, he's going to glance at you, Vax. You see this time, it pulls itself back and with this grin, it catches your eye and has a slight shine to its connection. It whispers something under its breath. Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.text: Advantage! I'm so glad I made such a hearty meal.

lines.text: Ugh, 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm possessed, man.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Counterspell. 4th level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently don't have visual on him.

lines.text: Besides, you should have done that shit already! The moment already happened. I'm possessed.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shut up. I'm trying to save you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't retcon that shit.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Same team!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the big statue, right there. So you are currently dominated. It is now your turn. The rakshasa is going to send you up behind Kash.

lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It makes sense. He comes in and heals the party and is closest to you and has no idea that you're currently turned against the rest of your allies. Make an attack on him.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm attacking him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's attacking you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You suck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm hasted. My boots are hasted. So here I go. Oh, that's good. That is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I do damage on all of these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and do your sneak attack damage on this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, but there's no sneak attack, so not that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say this. Make a perception check.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. I perceive I'm going to get my ass kicked. Oh, good! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're aware of it. So you don't get sneak attack damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (carving noises) You're already cut up. You don't even know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first one was eight damage, so you take eight damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is not sneak attack, so it's not the worst it could be.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thanks. I'm not stabbing you the worst I could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my life-stealing dagger, and on a natural 20, I get the ten hit points that I cut from him. Or whatever I get, I guess.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Just do it without the tiny little smile!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was seven, which is doubled to 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice is doubled, and then you add the modifier.

lines.text: How does it work? It says I get ten hit points, so I just get ten, or do I get up to what I cut him for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You deal damage, and then you heal yourself ten hit points, draining the life of whatever you damaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the good news is, I'm back up to full.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, that is good news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you took another eight damage.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I took another eight? Sweet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes that third dagger, man. This one is poisonous. And that hits.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughs) Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take Wil's dice.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Again, you can't get the smile off your face! It's etched in there permanently! You suck! Look at that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is an eight, plus the poison has a DC of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take another eight damage, and then make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll a 15 or higher, please, Will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You guys are immune to poison, thanks to the meal that she made.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as he eviscerates you with the daggers, most of the armor's absorbing a lot of the blows and you're feeling the impact and one of them catches you in the side, and you feel the poison pulse into your system, but your physical body shuts it down, and you feel yourself unaffected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry! I'm so sorry!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And I want to look at him and go, why are you smiling the whole time?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's putting it on my face. I can't help it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The whole time, you're smiling!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so guilty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your turn to make another wisdom saving throw with advantage to try and resist it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage. 19 or a five. So I'll take the 19. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've resisted the effect. Domination fades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man. I feel so bad about this.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You don't. I don't buy that face at all. I don't buy it at all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kash, it's your turn.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh. Wow. My turn, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Channel it to where it matters.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So he is still--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm good. I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he finishes attacking, he goes, (grunts, pants).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, did you save from it? Dope.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I have to heal myself, somehow. I have to, or I'm just not going to be around for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it. We need our healer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Take a potion.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I don't have any potions.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: A healer dying would be like your warrior never being able to hit anything.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That would be crazy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. It's crazy, because it scales for players.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I have one more level five. Oh, I can do a level-6 Heal, if I wanted to, but I want to hold onto my level six. I think I'm going to do my last level-5 Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that does to everybody?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hang on. Six creatures. Oh, you're full? That must be nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30-foot radius sphere. You can hit everybody here, for the most part. You can hit all of your allies there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And 3d8 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus five, and then plus an additional seven. So it would be plus 12. 3d8 plus 12.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 3d8 plus 12. Okay, that's the same thing as last time, so 17 plus 12.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Again, 29. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everyone heals 29 hit points. That is the end of your 5th-level spells. You are out of 5th-levels.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I am now out of 5th-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Kash's turn. The shield guardian is going to turn this way and is going to attempt to pummel on you.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Dead or alive, you're coming with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 25 to hit.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Oh, it turns out that that hits me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The second one is a 13.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That does not hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'm still pretty close to the rakshasa, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chopper, sic balls.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. However, are your natural weapons magical?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they are, because Circle of the Moon, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. So yes, you do bypass his nonmagical physical immunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growls) And then I do my claws, which happen twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the damage total on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then yeah, that's good, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what's your alignment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's my alignment? I'm good. I'm Keyleth. I'm neutral good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just checking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's becoming the Destroyer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the other two attacks are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 22 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, do I get two claw attacks, or just one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did you say "clow?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Clow." My "clows."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does it say for the multi-attack of the tiger form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says-- oh, wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saber-toothed tiger is the form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I have a pounce. I guess I don't have a multi-attack. So I just have the bite attack? Or do I also get a claw attack, as well, as my two actions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have multi-attack with that creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One is piercing, and one is slashing, right? So I'll do my bite. (growls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiger on tiger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, (growls) right back to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to stay put, or are you going to move away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm up in his ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're staying right there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There's another website for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Move me in sight range of both of them. As a good sorcerer would be positioned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll cast Silence right in the center of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Center of the room?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not hitting Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There is an orb of Silence here that fills the vicinity. All righty.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I sit in Indian-style position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's called crisscross applesauce now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now cast stuff, butthole! I dissipate my Greater Invisibility spell so it can see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thorbir, you're up.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I am attacking the guardian again, and I will be doing another one of my commander's strikes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So I will direct you, again, to hit the dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growls) Bite. No. Son of a cock.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I rolled a 12 on my die, so 18. 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing for me.
